go run mtime.go
cp stderr mtime_before

cue fmt not_modified.cue -l
stdout ''

go run mtime.go
cp stderr mtime_after

cmp mtime_before mtime_after
-- not_modified.cue --
[]
-- mtime.go --
package main

import "os"

func main () {
	s, _ := os.Stat("not_modified.cue")
	print(s.ModTime().UnixNano())
}
